channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Berthelot's conjecture via homotopy theory
item.description: arXiv:2406.02182v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We use motivic methods to give a quick proof of Berthelot's conjecture stating that the push-forward map in rigid cohomology of the structural sheaf along a smooth and proper map has a canonical structure of overconvergent F-isocrystal on the base.
item.dc:creator: Veronika Ertl, Alberto Vezzani

item.title: Relative K-homology of higher-order differential operators
item.description: arXiv:2308.01977v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We extend the notion of a spectral triple to that of a higher-order relative spectral triple, which accommodates several types of hypoelliptic differential operators on manifolds with boundary. The bounded transform of a higher-order relative spectral triple gives rise to a relative K-homology cycle. In the case of an elliptic differential operator on a compact smooth manifold with boundary, we calculate the K-homology boundary map of the constructed relative K-homology cycle to obtain a generalization of the Baum-Douglas-Taylor index theorem.
item.dc:creator: Magnus Fries
